p:
In this study the ensemble climate realizations are produced by the Planet Simulator (PlaSim)
23 intermediate complexity climate model and by one of the state-of-the-art climate models, the Community Earth System Model–Large Ensemble project (CESM–LE)
24, 25 . The spreading of the pollutants is simulated by the Real Particle Lagrangian Trajectory (RePLaT) model
26, 27 . We emphasize that to our knowledge, this is the first study investigating the change in the intensity of the atmospheric large-scale transport processes in the ensemble approach.
